for_sales.sales_text: Gaff rigged boat Theodosia (Falmouth working boat) with good sailing characteristics and plenty of interior space. Mainsail, jib and roller canopy (2016) In the cabin there is a refrigerator, stove Dometic Origo 3000 on spirits, running water, toilet. Sailing trips along and through the Belgian and Dutch waters. Further sailing holidays to Normandy, South and East Coast of England, the Baltic Sea and Copenhagen. Member of the Old Gaffers association Nederland 0027 and welcome guest at events on the Belgian coast.
for_sales.summary: Final price not known. Sold to Hamburg in 2024

boat.full_description: Theodosia is a Falmouth working boat with good sailing characteristics and plenty of interior space. She is based in the Netherlands, and had taken sailing trips along and through the Belgian and Dutch waters. Further sailing holidays to Normandy, South and East Coast of England, the Baltic Sea and Copenhagen. Member of the Old Gaffers association Nederland 0027 and welcome guest at events on the Belgian coast.
boat.name: Theodosia
boat.short_description: Originally built to fish, then owned by B Kessler Duseldorf, AJ Koot, Zubphen, and fitted out as a yacht in the Netherlands.
